title: The Halloween Dino Trip
description: Jillian is planning her first big Halloween party and hopes the weather holds out. Well, the weather does...but after Jillian, in her witch's outfit playfully chants the following from a prop witch's spell “Changes are due… Not many but a few To meet your history And see it’s not misery Ghosts will abound Trekking all around For you will now travel In a land full of marvel” everyone is in for the surprise of their life. Her backyard is gone. In its place greenery filled with tall trees, a variety of bushes, and...DINOSAURS?
author: Lea  Schizas
